'''''Gekkostate''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete all 3 [[Warrior's Challenge]]s in the [[Toyac Springs]] with a grade of SS.

==Gameplay Notes==
The challenges can be started by talking to [[Matzatli]] in [[Coatepec Mountain]], [[Tepache]], and [[Avuia]] in [[Toyac Springs]].
